summary: My farewell gift since i'm leaving Skyrim Modding. Thanks to Robton and Kaos Wulf for creating this follower.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/xwwq4d4.png[/img]
Thank you for providing me with a great source of inspiration to help me mold my characters.  The amount of love & encouragement you people showered me with was exhilarating to say the least. Thanks to your invaluable help and feedback regarding my characters, I'd been somewhat successful in creating characters that were very well received by the community and for which I'm very grateful.
 
Unfortunately, it appears my time here has come to an end. I've decided to retire from not only Skyrim, but gaming altogether due to RL complications. I don't know when I'll be back, or if I'll be back at all.
 
I'm extremely grateful to both Kaos Wulf & Robton who volunteered to help me craft a farewell gift for you guys. Please accept this humble gift and make good use of it, and if possible, in a positive manner. I've poured my heart and soul into creating this character and would really appreciate that you all do the same.
 
Much love and until we meet again.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/EVbOHLg.png[/img]
Name: Zuleika
Race: Nord
Voice: Young Eager
Body: SevenBase/7B, UNPB, UNPB BBP and CBBE
Default Armor: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21572/] Blood Witch Armor by Zerofrost Satyr[/url]
Default Weapon: Steel Sword
Location: The Winking Skeever, Solitude
She is Marriable and Essential.
She is a Witchblade, and is experienced in Destruction and Restoration magic.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/v657Xg9.png[/img]
For the SevenBase or UNPB BBP versions, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/] XP32 Maximum Skeleton[/url] is required to prevent CTD's

[img]http://i.imgur.com/pSdTgWx.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/] Extensive Follower Framework[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/] Follower Commentary Overhaul
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59399/?]Crimson Twilight Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60389/?]Crimson Twilight - Al Dahna Re-tex[/url]

[url=http://imgur.com/QVMhKEY][img]http://i.imgur.com/QVMhKEY.png[/img][/url]
[youtube]t4EZ0eaVxZc[/youtube]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/xZFlDmP.png[/img]
Q: She can't be found.
A: type 'prid xx001836', then 'moveto player'. Replace the 'xx' with your load order.
To get the load order, type 'help Zuleika' and take note of the first two numbers.

Q: Will she have a custom voice?
A: No, She will not.

Q: I don't like (insert thing you don't like here), could you change it?
A: No this is her FINAL appearance and behavior, since I'm leaving Skyrim Modding.

Q: I get an CTD when I take of her clothes, what to do?
A: You're probably using the 7B version or one of the UNPB BBP version, read the "Required Mods" Section.

Q: She doesn't look as good in my game compared to yours, why?
A: You probably use a different ENB and mod setup.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/C4DfUbX.png[/img]
Robton and Kaos Wulf for making the Follower and taking screenshots.
Shocky, Stealthic and Kalilies for the hair.
Zonzai and Seren for the skin textures.
Hellosanta for the normalmaps.
Diethardt for the make-up.
Zerofrost for the armor.
lthot for the eyebrows.
JimtownIrish for the eyes.
NeonFirefly for screenshots and testing.[/center]
author: JDK_Robton_Kaos Wulf
